wikipedia_page.main: Sir Eric James Neal,  (born 3 June 1924) is a retired Australian businessman and public officer. He is a former Commissioner of Sydney (1987–1988), Governor of South Australia (1996–2001) and Chancellor of Flinders University (2002–2010).

response: alt=Sir Eric Neal, Chancellor of Flinders University (2002–2010)|thumb|Sir Eric Neal, Chancellor of Flinders University (2002–2010)

*Governor of South Australia – Sir Eric Neal (until 3 November), then Marjorie Jackson-Nelson
*Governor of South Australia – Sir Eric Neal

In late September 1997, the then three constituent colleges in Adelaide moved to a campus at Brooklyn Park, South Australia which had been vacated by the Salesian College. Teaching began on 7 October and the ACD campus was officially opened on Sunday, 9 November by the Governor of South Australia, Sir Eric Neal.
